text: @realDonaldTrump Trump, Giuliani & Navarro are ALL encouraging people to take Hydroxychloroquine. NONE are doctors. Are they personally profiting? The drug has NO proven efficacy w/COVID19. What they’re doing is dangerous & ALL should be criminally & legally liable.
